Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Radisson Blu Hotel, Cologne in Cologne (Deutz), you'll be convenient to LANXESS Arena and Great St. Martin Church. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of Odysseum and Claudius Therme.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 393 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and safes.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreational opportunities offered, including a health club, a sauna, and a steam room. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and express check-in. Planning an event in Cologne? This hotel has 10469 square feet (973 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

LANXESS Arena - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Odysseum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Claudius Therme - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Cologne Triangle Panorama - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi

Musical Dome - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Hohenzollern Bridge - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Cologne Philharmonic - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Cologne Cable Car - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Great St. Martin Church - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Ludwig Museum - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Cologne Zoo - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Alter Markt - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Haymarket - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Romano-Germanic Museum - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi

The preferred airport for Radisson Blu Hotel, Cologne is Cologne (CGN-Cologne - Bonn) - 11.1 km / 6.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
